definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:ManniChatter</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:ManniChatter</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:ManniChatter</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Changed chatter to </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:ManniChatter</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
